attributes.action: UK Government: Ban advertising alcohol in all public places, including bar/ shop fronts, and on TV
attributes.additional_details: Most people can make an informed decision whether to take alcohol or leave it and understand the health issues that go with this risk. They do not need the constant pressure of having adverts thrust upon them everytime they are at home or out and about. Try this experiment. How many times in a day can you tick off the times alcohol has been advertised in some form to get you to partake! Why do we set ourselves up for a fall by allowing the advertisers to get away with this. Watch out for the Xmas deluge!
